property.value: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) HeadlessChrome/63.0.3239.108 Safari/537.36

testcase.name: Widget Widget initialization When the widget is instanciated, Then its end_date must equal to the current date and start_date must equal to end_date minus one week
Widget switchToReadingMode Given a widget in writing mode, When I switch to the reading mode, Then the reading mode is shown
Widget switchToReadingMode Given a widget in writing mode and some data, When I switch to the reading mode, Then the reading mode is shown
WidgetWritingMode Cancel When I click on the cancel button, Then an event is emitted without data to broadcast
WidgetWritingMode switchToReadingMode When I click on the search button, Then the selected dates are broadcast through an event.
WidgetReadingMode switchToWritingMode When I switch to writing mode, Then an event is emitted
WidgetArtifactTable getFormattedDate When I call this method with a string date, Then it returns a formatted date.
